subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Even if the Americans can erase a 10-6 deficit in the Sunday singles, the flaws in Watson’s captaincy in the Ryder Cup will not be easily forgotten.
snippet: Even if the Americans can erase a 10-6 deficit in the Sunday singles, the flaws in Watson’s captaincy in the Ryder Cup will not be easily forgotten.
